title: Introduction to Block Diagrams
description: Real example from Mermaid.js block documentation
code:
block
  columns 3
  Frontend blockArrowId6<[" "]>(right) Backend
  space:2 down<[" "]>(down)
  Disk left<[" "]>(left) Database[("Database")]

  classDef front fill:#696,stroke:#333;
  classDef back fill:#969,stroke:#333;
  class Frontend front
  class Backend,Database back

title: Syntax
description: Real example from Mermaid.js classDiagram documentation
code:
classDiagram
%% This whole line is a comment classDiagram class Shape <<interface>>
class Shape{
    <<interface>>
    noOfVertices
    draw()
}

title: Syntax
description: Real example from Mermaid.js classDiagram documentation

title: Syntax
description: Real example from Mermaid.js classDiagram documentation
code:
classDiagram
class Shape
link Shape "https://www.github.com" "This is a tooltip for a link"
class Shape2
click Shape2 href "https://www.github.com" "This is a tooltip for a link"

title: Syntax
description: Real example from Mermaid.js classDiagram documentation
code:
classDiagram
class Shape
callback Shape "callbackFunction" "This is a tooltip for a callback"
class Shape2
click Shape2 call callbackFunction() "This is a tooltip for a callback"

title: Syntax
description: Real example from Mermaid.js classDiagram documentation
code:
classDiagram
    class Class01
    class Class02
    callback Class01 "callbackFunction" "Callback tooltip"
    link Class02 "https://www.github.com" "This is a link"
    class Class03
    class Class04
    click Class03 call callbackFunction() "Callback tooltip"
    click Class04 href "https://www.github.com" "This is a link"

title: A node (default)

flowchart LR
  A e1@--> B
  classDef animate stroke-dasharray: 9,5,stroke-dashoffset: 900,animation: dash 25s linear infinite;
  class e1 animate

title: A note to users
description: Real example from Mermaid.js gantt documentation
code:
gantt
    title A Gantt Diagram
    %% This is a comment
    dateFormat YYYY-MM-DD
    section Section
        A task          :a1, 2014-01-01, 30d
        Another task    :after a1, 20d
    section Another
        Task in Another :2014-01-12, 12d
        another task    :24d
